# Required packages for DesktopMatePort on openSUSE
# Core dependencies
wine-staging
wine-staging-32bit
winetricks
python3
zenity
wget
wmctrl
cpulimit

# Graphics and desktop integration
Mesa-dri
libvulkan1
vulkan-tools
xdg-utils

# Audio support
pulseaudio
pulseaudio-utils

# Development tools (needed for some operations)
gcc
gcc-c++
make
git

# KDE integration (for KDE users)
libKF5WindowSystem5
kwayland-devel

# Wayland support
wayland-devel
wayland-protocols-devel

# Additional dependencies for better compatibility
cabextract
7zip
unzip
